<page title>: Cleverboxes - E2483HS-B1 | Iiyama ProLite E2483HS (24 inch) LED Backlit LCD Monitor 1000:1 250cd/m2 (1920x1080) 2ms VGA/DVI/HDMI (Black)
certifications: TCO, CE, TUV-GS, VCCI-B, PSE, CU
description: HDMI stands for High-Definition Multimedia Interface. Much smaller and more convenient than DVI, HDMI also has the significant advantage over DVI that it supports audio as well as video signals. This LED monitor is equipped with two high quality stereo speakers. VESA mount compliance means you can easily mount your monitor to a wall.
in the box: Iiyama ProLite E2483HS Monitor (Black), Power cable, VGA (D-Sub) cable, DVI-D cable, Audio cable, Stand, Stand-base, Cable holder, Quick start guide, Safety guide
language selection: 10 languages (EN, FR, DE, IT, PL, ES, NL, JP, Chinese, RU)
user controls: Auto adjust, luminance (brightness, contrast), geometry (H. position, V. position, clock, phase), colour, OSD (H. position, V. position, timeout), language, recall, miscellaneous (sharpness, DDC/CI, display information, ACR, display mode, OD, opening logo), input select, audio adjust (volume, mute, HDMI audio) and 6 front controls (Power, Menu/ Select, +/ Volume, -/ ECO, Exit, Auto)
warranty: Two years on-site (plus 1 free year extra - registration required).
